description:
Debutake, whose name appears to be a nickname (debu being a derogatory term meaning `fat` or even `fatty`, `fatso`), is a student at the Koudan High School. He is shown being bullied by two http://anidb.net/t7212 [gyarus].
During the school attack arc both of his oppressors (who were actually undercover agents working for the Ministry of Health, Labour and Welfare) were killed by http://anidb.net/ch148035 [Saruta].
Although it is not confirmed on screen he is believed to have died along with the school`s http://anidb.net/ch148032 [headteacher] when the school building collapsed.
name: Debutake
